definition: classics/sacred book/scripture/to pass through/to undergo/to bear/to endure/warp (textile)/longitude/menstruation/channel (TCM)/abbr. for economics 經濟|经济[jing1 ji4]
abbr. for Uighur 維吾爾|维吾尔[Wei2 wu2 er3]/surname Wei
to preserve/to maintain/to hold together/dimension/vitamin (abbr. for 維生素|维生素[wei2 sheng1 su4])

sentences.english: The unmyelinated nerve fibers either terminate around the blood capillaries or approach near pituicytes.
sentences.chinese: 无髓神经纤维终止于毛细血管周围或仅贴垂体细胞。

sentences.english: The regenerating fibers were mainly small myelinated fibers.
sentences.chinese: 再生纤维主要为细小的有髓神经纤维。

sentences.english: A solitary intraosseous neurofibroma is rare and mostly occurs in the mandible.
sentences.chinese: 孤独内神经纤维瘤是罕见的，主要发生在颌骨。

sentences.english: Only by incision of the perineurium the nerve fibres can be completely decompressed.
sentences.chinese: 因此只有切开束膜，神经纤维才能获得完全减压。

sentences.english: The skin nerve fibers were detected in the fetal rabbits at 22 days gestation.
sentences.chinese: 胎龄22天胎兔背部皮肤已有神经纤维支配。

sentences.english: In addition, VIP-like fibers were also seen in the supraoptic nucleus.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在视上核内见到了VIP样神经纤维。

sentences.english: The...divisions... are none other than the beginnings of this nerve fibre net.
sentences.chinese: 这些部分是神经纤维网络的发端。

sentences.english: The tumor is usually associated with neurofibromatosis type 1 (NF-1).
sentences.chinese: 这种肿瘤经常合并有第一型神经纤维瘤病。

sentences.english: General travel operation excises nerve fibroma.
sentences.chinese: 神经纤维瘤一般行手术切除。

sentences.english: Multiplicity is a common feature in GI tract neurofibromas and GISTs.
sentences.chinese: 胃肠道神经纤维瘤及GISTs的常见特点是多发。

sentences.english: The pit organ contains nerve fibres known as trigeminal ganglia.
sentences.chinese: 窝器内有三叉神经节的神经纤维。

sentences.english: The treatment tries to stimulate the growth of new fibres by injecting glucose into the ligaments.
sentences.chinese: 向韧带注射葡萄糖是为了加速神经纤维的再生。

sentences.english: The isolated gastric neurofibroma is a rare disease and is difficult to be diagnosed before operation.
sentences.chinese: 单发性胃神经纤维瘤临床颇为少见，术前诊断困难。

sentences.english: The retinal nerve fiber layer tends to become thinning with age.
sentences.chinese: 随年龄的增长，视网膜神经纤维层有变薄的趋势。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate nerve fibers connection between locus coeruleus and the dorsal column nuclei in rats.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨大鼠蓝斑与背柱核间的神经纤维联系。

sentences.english: In the transitional segment, neurons and nerve fibers were distributed linearly along the longitudinal muscle fibers.
sentences.chinese: 神经元和神经纤维呈沿纵行肌长轴线性分布。

definition: myelin sheath (membrane surrounding axon of nerve cell)
axon (long thin axis of nerve cell)

pinyin: shen2 jing1 jiao1 zhi4 xi4 bao1

definition: afferent nerve (transmitting in to the brain)/afferent neuron
